content: That's a great idea! With a Japan Rail Pass, I'll be able to travel freely on JR trains, and my Suica card will cover my local transportation needs. Since I've narrowed it down to two options for accommodations - a hostel in Shinjuku for $30 a night or an Airbnb in Harajuku for $50 a night - I think I'll prioritize staying in a central location to make the most of my time in Tokyo. Do you have any recommendations for must-try foods or restaurants in Shinjuku or Harajuku?
